content: hello world this pattern has been in the queue to be posted for a loooong looong time i think i finished this guy in may lol finally he gets a chance to shine spinda is a very simple but super cute pattern and you can individualize it by resizing and repositioning the spots go ahead and make your own spinny little panda pokemon materials to make spinda you will need a 2 5mm crochet hook cream and off-red colored yarn as well as black embroidery thread for the facial features a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round and i also recommend pins please note that you can make spinda using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook spinda should be about 15cm tall stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase slip_stitch if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
